thread.section_title: SYSTEMS 4 YOU recenzje | Opinie konsumentów na temat SYSTEMS 4 YOU | systems4you.eu
thread.title: Mr Unknown
thread.title_full: SYSTEMS 4 YOU został oceniony przez Mr Unknown

author: Mr Unknown
title: Mr Unknown
text: On the 27:th of January I placed an order and paid for a remote control for Hörmann HSE 1 BS on there site with a delivery of about 7 working days. On the status page for the order it stated that it was shipped on the 6:th of February but with no tracking ID. Today it's the first of March an I haven't received the shipment. I have sent 2 questions through there contact form but haven't received any kind of respons other than an automatic answer saying that they will answer within 24 hours (the first I sent more than a week ago). I suppose I have to come to term with that I have been cheated for almost 500 SEK (about 52€)
